## Summary

One short sentence describing the feature or improvement.

## Motivation

Why is this useful? (e.g. "I want to … so that …")

## Proposed behaviour

- What should happen?
- Where does it apply (CLI, TUI, agent, Notion, config)?

## Alternatives considered

Any other ways to achieve the same goal?

## Additional context

- Optional: link to [FEATURES.md](../../FEATURES.md) bullet if this comes from the ideas list.
- Optional: mockups, examples, or references.
